import "../assets/styles/style.css" import "../assets/styles/details.css" import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Axios from "axios" import { useState,useEffect } from "react" const Details = () =>{ const [carId,setCarId] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ var url_pre = window.location.href; console.log(url_pre) var url = url_pre.slice(30) Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/details/${url}`).then((response)=>{ setCarId(response.data) console.log(response.data) }) },[]) return( <>

{carId}

#2

descricao

2020/2020

24.204 km

R$ 249.034
) } export default Details ;
